  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BloomFilter
    A bloom filter is a space efficient datastructure used to test membership against some set of data.
    EmptyIterator<E>
    Used when we need an iterator, but there no items to iterate.
    MergeSortedIterator<E>
    Merge multiple, sorted iterators into a single iterator.
    MerkleTree
    A merkle tree is a hierarchical way to store a checksum.
    MinimumIterator<E>
    Selects a single item from a set of choices.

    OptionsSerializer
    Serialize open options.
    PruneOptions
    Pruning options that are used to determine which data to delete.

    Used when we need an iterator, but there is only a single item.

    A vector clock is a logical time mechanism that consists of a set of two-tuples .
